objective¶

This module contains the class Objective

Author:
Yu-Ren Liu, Xiong-Hui Chen
class objective.Objective(func=None, dim=None, constraint=None, resample_func=None)[source]¶

This class represents the objective function and its associated variables

__init__(func=None, dim=None, constraint=None, resample_func=None)[source]¶

Initialization.

Parameters:
  • func – objective function defined by the user
  • dim – a Dimension object, which describes the search space.
  • constraint – constraint function for POSS
  • resample_func – resample function for SSRacos
  • reducedim – whether to use sequential random embedding
clean_history()[source]¶

clean the optimization history

construct_solution(x, parent=None)[source]¶

Construct a solution from x

Parameters:
  • x – a list
  • parent – the attached structure
Returns:

solution

Default inherited function.

Parameters:parent – the parent structure
Returns:None
static default_post_inherit(parent=None)[source]¶

Default post inherited function.

Parameters:parent – the parent structure
Returns:None
eval(solution)[source]¶

Use the objective function to evaluate a solution.

Parameters:solution –
Returns:value of fx(evaluation result) will be returned
get_history_bestsofar()[source]¶

Get the best-so-far history.

parameter_set(parameter)[source]¶

Use a Parameter object to set attributes in Objective object.

Parameters:parameter – a Parameter object
Returns:no return
resample(solution, repeat_times)[source]¶

Resample function for value suppression.

Parameters:
  • solution – a Solution object
  • repeat_times – repeat times
Returns:

repeat times
set_func(func)[source]¶

Set the objective function :param func: the objective function :return: no return value
